## goup-util workspace remove

Remove a module from the workspace

### Synopsis

Remove a module from the Go workspace using 'go work drop'.

The module path should match exactly what's in the go.work file.

```
goup-util workspace remove <module-path> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force   Force removal without confirmation
  -h, --help    help for remove
```

### SEE ALSO

* [goup-util workspace](goup-util_workspace.md)	 - Manage Go workspace files
